de.l_infotech.spaceinvader.connection

Interface DisplayConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BluetoothConnector

    public interface DisplayConnection
    This interface handels the connection between device and Display
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ludwig Biermann

    • Method Detail

      • isSupported

        boolean isSupported()
        Checks if the Connection is possible
        Returns:
        {true} if device does support the Connection

        Try whether the Connection is enable
        Returns:
        {true} if Connection is enable

        Returns:
